definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: Termites are a gourmet treat in Africa.
sentences.chinese: 白蟻是非洲人的美味佳餚。

sentences.english: Objective To control the destructive damage induced by termites using the method of toxic baits in new houses and buildings.
sentences.chinese: 目的採用藥餌法控制白蟻對新建房屋建築破壞性危害。

sentences.english: Termites have eaten the posts and mined the fence.
sentences.chinese: 白蟻蛀壞木柱，毀了柵欄。

sentences.english: Trains running on termite-eaten sleepers are running the risk of going off the rails.
sentences.chinese: 鐵路枕木如果受白蟻侵蝕，火車就有出軌的危險。

sentences.english: The control effect of Baktop capsules to Reticulitermes speratus was better than that of to Coptotermes formosanus.
sentences.chinese: 白捕特微膠囊對於黃胸散白蟻比家白蟻效果更好。

sentences.english: The control effect of Baktop capsules to Reticulitermes speratus was better than that of to Coptotermes formosanus.
sentences.chinese: 白捕特微膠囊對於黃胸散白蟻比家白蟻效果更好。

sentences.english: Conclusion Keyixing powder could be used as the alternative of Mirex for termite control.
sentences.chinese: 結論克蟻星粉劑可替代滅蟻靈用於白蟻防治。

sentences.english: Another climbed a bit higher and attempted to walk by a cylindricus minor worker.
sentences.chinese: 一隻爬得更高些，還想超過一隻柱狀白蟻。

sentences.english: Generally speaking, termite-eaten wire poles ought to be replaced every two or three years.
sentences.chinese: 電杆被白蟻蛀蝕，一般兩三年就要換一次。

sentences.english: Termite pre-treatments are very inexpensive and highly effective.
sentences.chinese: 我們爲你提供省時而有效的白蟻預防處理工程。

sentences.english: Odontotermes hainanensis (Light) is an important insect pest damaging the dikes of reservoirs in South China.
sentences.chinese: 海南土白蟻是我國南方諸省土質堤壩的重要危害種類。

sentences.english: The first was too worm-like, looking like a bloated queen termite.
sentences.chinese: 第一個太像蟲子，看起來像肥胖的白蟻蟻后。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the efficacy of two new termiticides against termites.
sentences.chinese: 目的比較兩種新型防治白蟻藥物的效果。

sentences.english: A double rainbow frames termite mounds in Australia's grasslands.
sentences.chinese: 雙重彩虹籠罩了澳大利亞草原上的白蟻冢。

sentences.english: Another nest found in Africa was a tall as a building.
sentences.chinese: 在非洲發現的一個白蟻穴有一幢樓那麼高。

sentences.english: When talking about the white ants, Lu Li says.
sentences.chinese: 在談到白蟻時，書中寫道。

definition: imago (adult, sexually mature insect, the final stage of its development)
reptiles/also written 爬行類|爬行类
giant Amazon snail (Ampullaria gigas spix), that has devastated rice paddies in China since its introduction in the 1980s
fire and candles/household things that burn
